name: sgnuikit
description: SGNUIKit is a very powerful UI kit designed to allow web developers use the power of the kit to build efficient and beautiful websites. SGNUIKit is currently being used in all the websites by SGNetworks.

scripts.ReleaseFree: npm run BuildFree & node .\build\publish.js --flavor free & node .\build\release.js --flavor free
scripts.ReleasePro: npm run BuildPro & node .\build\publish.js --flavor pro & node .\build\release.js --flavor pro
scripts.Release: npm run ReleaseFree & npm run ReleasePro
